name: BitBotHero
description:
Hi! My name is 8aku (Rachel) and I'm from central Canada.
This is my first game jam submission.
I aimed for simple, high-contrast and something I could more or less complete within the time constraints. This game was created in ~12 hours. Perhaps in the near future I will expand on this idea. Thanks for playing!

[A few bugs: pretty end menu does not show up properly and bit counter does not reset]
